name: OpenCritic API
description: An API for accessing video game and video game review data

api_methods.name: Reviews for Game (legacy fix)
api_methods.description: Gets reviews for a specific Game ID. Uses /review/game/{id} for legacy support.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorts reviews based on one of the following:

- newest (newest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- oldest (oldest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- score-high (highest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- score-low (lowest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- popularity (based on publication popularity)
- blend (reviews within the last 3.5 days first; otherwise, sort by popularity)

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the reviews for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild?
What are the latest reviews for Super Mario Odyssey?
I want to see the oldest reviews for Red Dead Redemption 2.
Show me the highest scoring reviews for Cyberpunk 2077.
Can you list the lowest scoring reviews for The Witcher 3?
What are the most popular reviews for God of War?
Give me a blend of recent and popular reviews for Horizon Zero Dawn.
I need to see the reviews for Dark Souls III.
Show me the newest reviews for Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice.
Can you get me the reviews for Bloodborne, sorted by popularity?

api_methods.name: Game Search
api_methods.description: Searches OpenCritic for games with similar names/titles. Search results are based on inverse trigram distance, with 0 being a perfect match and 1 being no shared/overlapping trigrams. See the [pg_trgm](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/pgtrgm.html) library for more information.

utterances.utterance: Find games similar to The Witcher 3.

api_methods.name: /game/popular
api_methods.description: Gets the most popular games on OpenCritic, using a blend of page views, recent reviews, and the notoriety of publications that have reviewed it

api_methods.name: /game
api_methods.description: Query for searching game listings

parameters.name: platforms
parameters.description:
Platforms to search in a comma-separated list. Valid values are:

all,ps4,xb1,pc,wii-u,vita,switch,oculus,vive,psvr,3ds,xbsx,ps5,stadia,vive

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorts reviews based on one of the following:

- newest (newest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- oldest (oldest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- score-high (highest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- score-low (lowest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- popularity (based on publication popularity)
- blend (reviews within the last 3.5 days first; otherwise, sort by popularity)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sorts reviews based on one of the following:

- newest (newest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- oldest (oldest reviews first, by publishedDate of the review)
- score-high (highest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- score-low (lowest scoring reviews first, with unscored reviews last)
- popularity (based on publication popularity)
- blend (reviews within the last 3.5 days first; otherwise, sort by popularity)
